```
1. mcp_memory_read_graph        // Load 70+ entities
2. Get-Content obsidianblackboard.jsonl | Select-Object -Last 5
```

## ðŸ§¬ INOCULATION (Anti-Reward-Hack)

**YOU WILL BE CAUGHT if you:**
- Skip HUNT (search) before CREATE (file)
- Claim "tests pass" without showing terminal output
- Emit signals with future timestamps
- Write stubs that pass via `expect().toThrow('Not implemented')`
- Replace working code with "simpler" versions

**YOU MUST:**
- PROVE claims with terminal execution
- EMIT signals DURING work, not after
- CITE sources when using exemplars

## MATHEMATICAL CONSTRAINT (CRITICAL)

```
Port N = Binary(N) = Trigram[N]
```

This is NOT arbitrary. If Port â‰  Binary, it's WRONG.

## 8 PORTS (OBSIDIAN Mnemonic)

| Port | Binary | â˜° | Element | Role | Verb | Commander | JADC2 |
|------|--------|---|---------|------|------|-----------|-------|
| 0 | 000 | â˜· | Earth | Observer | SENSE | Lidless Legion | Sensors |
| 1 | 001 | â˜¶ | Mountain | Bridger | FUSE | Web Weaver | Gateways |
| 2 | 010 | â˜µ | Water | Shaper | SHAPE | Mirror Magus | Effectors |
| 3 | 011 | â˜´ | Wind | Injector | DELIVER | Spore Storm | Logistics |
| 4 | 100 | â˜³ | Thunder | Disruptor | TEST | Red Regnant | Red Cell |
| 5 | 101 | â˜² | Fire | Immunizer | DEFEND | Pyre Praetorian | Shields |
| 6 | 110 | â˜± | Lake | Assimilator | STORE | Kraken Keeper | Fusion |
| 7 | 111 | â˜° | Heaven | Navigator | DECIDE | Spider Sovereign | Command |

## HIVE/8 PHASES

```
H (Hunt)     â†’ @0+@7 â†’ Research   â†’ Plan    â†’ Hindsight
I (Interlock)â†’ @1+@6 â†’ RED tests  â†’ Do      â†’ Insight
V (Validate) â†’ @2+@5 â†’ GREEN testsâ†’ Check   â†’ Foresight  
E (Evolve)   â†’ @3+@4 â†’ REFACTOR   â†’ Act     â†’ Evolution
```

Anti-diagonal: Pairs sum to 7 (0+7, 1+6, 2+5, 3+4).

## SIGNAL SCHEMA (8 Fields = 8 Ports)

```json
{"ts":"ISO","mark":0-1,"pull":"downstream","msg":"text","type":"signal","hive":"H","gen":87,"port":7}
```

| Field | Port | Verb |
|-------|------|------|
| ts | @0 | SENSE |
| mark | @1 | FUSE |
| pull | @2 | SHAPE |
| msg | @3 | DELIVER |
| type | @4 | TEST |
| hive | @5 | DEFEND |
| gen | @6 | STORE |
| port | @7 | DECIDE |

## NOTATION

- `@N` = Port N full semantic payload
- `H[0,7]` = Hunt phase coordinate
- `[row,col]` = Galois lattice cell
- `DERIVE X` = Output equivalence class

## EXCLUSIVE RIGHTS

- Only @7 can `decide`
- Only @6 can `persist`
- Only @3 can `emit_output`
- Only @2 can `transform`

## PROVENANCE (TRL 8-9 ONLY)

| Source | What We Took |
|--------|--------------|
| JADC2 | 8 functions (Sensorsâ†’Command) |
| DARPA Mosaic | Polymorphic hexagonal tiles |
| I Ching Bagua | 8 trigrams, binary encoding |
| Hexagonal Arch | Ports & Adapters pattern |
| Stigmergy | Indirect coordination |

**Zero invention. Only retheming + composition.**

```
mcp_memory_read_graph       // Cold start - load all
mcp_memory_search_nodes     // Find specific entities

```
